text:
best macOS epub reader?
I can help you find an eBook reader for macOS.

Here are some popular options:

1.  Calibre: A free and open-source eBook management software that supports various eBook formats, including EPUB.
2.  FoxyVoluminous: A free, open-source eBook reader that also supports multiple formats and allows for highlighting, notes, and organization of eBooks.
3.  ReadAloud: A paid application that enables reading aloud text with natural voices and features like bookmarking and searching.
4.  BlueFire Reader: A subscription-based service offering a large library of e-Books in EPUB format, along with features like highlighting, note-taking, and search.

Please consider these options for an uncomplicated experience or to get more detailed explanations regarding their compatibility on macOS versions such as Mojave or later, you might check out [https://www.cnet.com/cheatsheet/computer/mac/](https://www.cnet.com/cheatsheet/computer/mac/) for up-to-date information.
